shen-etal-2023-modeling.title: Modeling Empathic Similarity in Personal Narratives
shen-etal-2023-modeling.author:
Shen, Jocelyn  and
Sap, Maarten  and
Colon-Hernandez, Pedro  and
Park, Hae  and
Breazeal, Cynthia
shen-etal-2023-modeling.typeNotRelevantText: This paper is about the task, a dataset and a model for Empathetic Similarity. The dataset contains "morals" of stories, i.e. a "higher-level meaning from the story". These are free-text descriptions of takeaways from a given story. The paper does not deal with moral values as we understand them.
